about_the_game:
This pack will upgrade your Terminal Conflict Commander in Chief Edition to the Flower Power Edition, which will provide you with the following extra content*:

Flower Power Terminal (cosmetic):

Give peace a chance and be sure to wear some flowers in your hear. This terminal is not an experience. It's a lifestyle. Fully unlocked, it comes no-obligation attached and although at one point it gave off a whiff of cheap chamomile aroma, that has long faded. LOVE.

Special Achievement (cosmetic):

Flower Power Steam Achievement unlocked.

Unique American Polices:

Six unique US policies in that can be enacted outside of your North American home theater.

Unique Soviet Polices:

Six unique USSR policies in that can be enacted outside of your Eastern European home theater.

Decisions:

Five new decisions that create even further unique opportunities.


*Extra content does not provide you an advantage in Multiplayer. When connecting to a player with a higher tier DLC the game for both players will always play the highest DLCs available.
detailed_description:
This pack will upgrade your Terminal Conflict Commander in Chief Edition to the Flower Power Edition, which will provide you with the following extra content*:

Flower Power Terminal (cosmetic):

Give peace a chance and be sure to wear some flowers in your hear. This terminal is not an experience. It's a lifestyle. Fully unlocked, it comes no-obligation attached and although at one point it gave off a whiff of cheap chamomile aroma, that has long faded. LOVE.

Special Achievement (cosmetic):

Flower Power Steam Achievement unlocked.

Unique American Polices:

Six unique US policies in that can be enacted outside of your North American home theater.

Unique Soviet Polices:

Six unique USSR policies in that can be enacted outside of your Eastern European home theater.

Decisions:

Five new decisions that create even further unique opportunities.


*Extra content does not provide you an advantage in Multiplayer. When connecting to a player with a higher tier DLC the game for both players will always play the highest DLCs available.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo Processor (2GHz or better)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Mouse and keyboard are required. / Internet Connection or 1 vs 1 Ranked multiplayer, or Direct connect in multiplayer mode.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo Processor (2GHz or better)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Mouse and keyboard are required. / Internet Connection or 1 vs 1 Ranked multiplayer, or Direct connect in multiplayer mode.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit or newer
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® IV 2.4 GHz eller AMD 3500+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce 8800 or ATI Radeon® X1900, 512mb video memory required
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X- compatible soundcard.
  • Additional Notes: Mouse and keyboard are required. / Internet Connection or 1 vs 1 Ranked multiplayer, or Direct connect in multiplayer mode.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 750 @ 2.66 GHz / AMD Phenom II X4 955 @ 3.20 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 6950 or NVIDIA GeForce GTX570 with 2GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X- compatible soundcard.
  • Additional Notes: Mouse and keyboard are required. / Internet Connection or 1 vs 1 Ranked multiplayer, or Direct connect in multiplayer mode.

short_description: Includes the all the goodies from the Terminal Conflict: Commander in Chief Edition; includes the Flower Power Terminal(cosmetic), Steam Achievement, Unique Leaders, Policies, and Decisions.
